00039 int UnixSignalHub::trap( int sig, USigHandler_t hfun )
00040 {
00041 
00042    // sa_mask has all registered signals calling the same callback function.
00043    sigaddset( &hub_.sa_.sa_mask, sig );
00044    
00045    info& sa_info = hub_.sigset_.at(sig);
